name: Mutiny Island (itch)
description:
The time for plundering is upon yee!
Journey through a vibrant and bustling pirate-themed open-world setting that changes day-to-day.

Mutiny Island is not a game that will hold your hand. Once the introduction cutscene has concluded, you're free to go about as you please. You will have to learn the in's and out's of the game world through experimentation and trial and error if you wish to reclaim your ship, the Red Dawn.

Relive classic pirate tropes as you try and escape being stranded on Mutiny Island. Earn some Gold Doubloons, buy a ship and take down your former first mate and crew. Be wary sailor, The Red Dawn may find and hunt you down first!

Will you pillage the Ports, raid the Dungeons and plunder the Deepest Depths for loot and booty? Does visiting with the gals at the Maiden's Tale tickle yerr fancy?
The Arbor Ocean is full of life, activity, and dilemmas to get lost in!

Game Features:

  • A completely open-world experience with full freedom from the start
  • Light survival elements and classic RPG feel
  • Dry and Wet Seasons
  • Randomly generated elements
  • Unique ways to interact with NPCs based on your characters stats
  • Starting Perks system
  • Three endings
  • Activities & mini-games
  • Real-time ship-to-ship combat
